derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Italian violino, diminutive of viola (see viola)

entry.def: A violin is a musical instrument. Violins are made of wood and have four strings. You play the violin by holding it under your chin and moving a bow across the strings.

example.ex: Lizzie used to play the violin.

example.tran: 勃拉姆斯D调小提琴协奏曲

means.word_mean: 1. bowed stringed instrument that is the highest member of the violin family; this instrument has four strings and a hollow body and an unfretted fingerboard and is played with a bow
